cards.notes:
Functional reprint of Ancestor’s Aid — Replaced Freneticism

I spent a good amount of time trying to figure out a version of Freneticism that felt strong, but not too strong, and also not too weak, but it seems like such a fine balance to strike that it’s hard to make it work and be appealing on a common. We also have a lot of leaves the battlefield stuff amoung the creatures, and I don’t think we need another such effect on a combat trick of all things.

New card — Replaced Splitting Headache

I know there was a request to keep Splitting Headache in the file, but I wanted at least one mythic ooze, and black ended up feeling like the most interesting and approrpriate place to put it. Splitting Headache is also relatively similar to the new addition of Chef’s Shadow.
